description: Lists the alerts that are associated with a MediaTailor channel assembly resource.

parameters.name: ResourceArn
parameters.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the resource.

nested_items.name: Items
nested_items.description: A list of alerts that are associated with this resource.

nested_items.name: AlertCode
nested_items.description: The code for the alert. For example, NOT_PROCESSED.

nested_items.name: AlertMessage
nested_items.description: If an alert is generated for a resource, an explanation of the reason for the alert.

nested_items.name: LastModifiedTime
nested_items.description: The timestamp when the alert was last modified.

nested_items.name: RelatedResourceArns
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Names (ARNs) related to this alert.

nested_items.name: ResourceArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the resource.

nested_items.name: Category
nested_items.description: The category that MediaTailor assigns to the alert.

nested_items.name: NextToken
nested_items.description: Pagination token returned by the list request when results exceed the maximum allowed. Use the token to fetch the next page of results.
